label: Phone and Address Search
description: Tools and services for finding phone numbers, addresses, and people.
intents: Find contact information for a person or business
Track the location of a phone number
Perform a background check on an individual

subcategories.label: Phone Number Lookup
subcategories.description: Tools and services for finding information about a phone number.

subcategories.label: Address Lookup
subcategories.description: Tools and services for finding information about an address.
subtopics: Find who lives at an address

subcategories.label: People Search
subcategories.description: Tools and services for finding information about people.

subcategories.label: Business Directory
subcategories.description: Directories of businesses and their contact information.
